activities: PatientCrossroads CONNECT collects patient opt-in medical history information and controls access to send messages to qualified clinical trial candidates.  Personal identifying information is never shared.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
personaldata: Name, birthday, city, state, zip, country, medical information is manually entered by consenting patients
